column4: I have problem installing warty on a shuttle sn85g4v2 with a sata drive. It gives an error that says it is unable to install the choosen kernel.
In konsol 3 this error message is displayed: The following packages have unmet dependencie: linux-amd64-generic: Depends: linux-image-amd64-generic but ut us not installable. E: Broken packages
An earlier error message says: Some index files failed to download, they have been ignored, or old ones used instead. Anyone know why these errors show up?
